title: 820-4924 doesnt run from battery
message:
No water damage, Just stopped charging (no green/orange light)

ISL625 pin 17/18 resistance was wrong so i replaced it, also R7151 ( value was wrong). 


Now MacBook boot, i have green and orange light but when unplug charger it takes about 3-4 seconds and computers sleeps. 

PP18V5_DCIN_CONN_R is 15V
PPBUS is 12,2V

Also replaced Q7130 but no result. 

SMC is dead?

title: 820-4924 doesnt run from battery
message:
"PPBUS is 12,2V"
Wrong voltage, with charger alone.
Looks like bad communication between SMC and U7100.
Check diode mode to ground and voltage on the battery bus.

"PP18V5_DCIN_CONN_R is 15V"
Are you using 45W charger?
This board requires 60W Magsafe 2 charger; it should boot with 85W too, but not 45W.

title: 820-4924 doesnt run from battery
message:
R5381 must be 2K OHMS but it is 15 OHMS . Replaced it but still same value. 


Diode mode: 

[B]SMBUS_CHGR_SCL = 0,003 
[B]SMBUS_CHGR_SDA = 0,497[/B][/B]

title: 820-4924 doesnt run from battery
message:
R5381 was probably good.
The short on the board have put you into confusion.

Remove D7050 and check again SCL line.

title: 820-4924 doesnt run from battery
message:
Removed D7050 and R5381 still 15ohms. Diode mode same (0,003)


It really seems bad connections between smc and ISL because voltage PIn 2 R5380 (SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SDA[B])[/B]on fluctuating from 0,2 to 3.3

title: 820-4924 doesnt run from battery
message:
Remove U7100 and check again diode mode on SCL line.
If still bad, then probably need to change SMC.

title: 820-4924 doesnt run from battery
message:
it was SMC. replaced and all is ok now


thank you 


P.S: Is there anyway to reprogramm SMC??? I got first from 820-3476 board (similar, but not same) and everything was ok but it was detecting 42 inches display and resolution was over 2500px.

title: 820-4924 doesnt run from battery
message: Thank you very much. this week will try flash it.
